long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ğŸš€ Hills of Steel is an action-packed shooter game that puts you in control of a tank! Race and blast your way through hilly battlefields filled with enemies. Unlock and deploy a variety of tanks, mechs, and robots in your quest for dominance! Enhance your tank's power with Boosters like mines, force shields, and rocket strikes. Can you build the ultimate tank and conquer the Hills of Steel? ğŸ›¡ï¸ğŸ’¥

ğŸ® How to play Hills of Steel:

Move: Use the A and D keys or the Arrow keys to drive your tank!
Shoot: Press the spacebar to shoot!
Repair: Hit the B button to repair your tank!

Play more games on the top-left menu.
